q1: Do I need to install anything?
a1: No. The screen recorder uses your browsers built-in screen capture API. It works directly in the browser without any downloads or extensions.
q2: Can I record audio along with the screen?
a2: Yes, you can enable audio recording to capture system sounds along with your screen. Toggle the Include audio option before starting.
a3: Recordings are saved in WebM format, which is supported by all modern browsers and video players. You can convert to other formats using video conversion tools.
